nodes.text: Star Wars: The Last Jedi is an interactive young-readers book based on the film of the same name. It was written by Erin Rose Wage and published by Phoenix International Publications, Inc. on December 15, 2017, as part of the Play-a-Sound series.
Relive key scenes from Star Wars: The Last Jedi. In this storybook filled with all of your favorite sounds & sound effects from the new film.
